name: Makruk
description:
Small but smart Makruk game! Play for free!

Makruk (Thai: หมากรุก), or Thai chess, is a board game that is descended from the 6th-century Indian game of chaturanga or a close relative thereof, and is therefore related to chess.

Makruk brings this great game to your phone. You can enjoy Makruk in family game time, or you can also enjoy the game by playing with the AIs of varying difficulties. Beware that it is very challenging to beat the best AI in this game!

You will also gain experience points by winning against the AIs (+1 for Easy, +3 for Medium, +5 for Hard, and +7 for Expert).

Features
- Daily Challenge
- Global Leaderboard via Game Center
- Share your games with friends
- Undo
- Save/load unfinished game
- AIs with four levels of difficulties
- Timer based game
